EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for our webinar: The Platform for Building Great Software
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://play.gopivotal.com/theplatformwebinarregister.html>
Pivotal invites you to join us <http://play.gopivotal.com/theplatformwebinarregister.html> on January 16, 2014 for an exclusive first look at Pivotal One, a comprehensive, multi-cloud Enterprise PaaS that runs on top of Pivotal CF, the leading enterprise distribution of the Cloud Foundry platform. Conversations and direct observations working with our customers confirm it is vital for enterprises to become excellent at delivering software at internet scale. Pivotal's new solution enables enterprise companies to bring new innovation to market faster than ever before, enabling agile development teams to rapidly update and scale applications across public or private clouds.
Moderated by James Watters, Head of Product and James Bayer, Director of Product Management, this webinar <http://play.gopivotal.com/theplatformwebinarregister.html> will explore:
- Why PaaS and Pivotal One, and Why Now? - The essential features of enterprise PaaS - Building a new class of data centric applications using Pivotal One - Extending Pivotal One with new services and runtimes
By attending this event your company will be eligible for a complimentary technical briefing, giving you the opportunity to dig deeper on the platform and engage with our expert engineering team. Register now for this exciting event: The Platform for Building Great Software <http://play.gopivotal.com/theplatformwebinarregister.html>
We look forward to having you join us.
Regards, The Pivotal Team
